tvShows.title: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
tvShows.plot: An exploration of our discovery of the laws of nature and coordinates in space and time
tvShows.creator: Carl Sagan, Ann Druyan, Steven Soter
tvShows.awards: Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Documentary or Nonfiction Series
tvShows.quote: The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff. We are a way for the universe to know itself.

tvShows.title: Daredevil (2015)
tvShows.plot: Blinded as a young boy, Matt Murdock fights injustice by day as a lawyer and by night as the Super Hero Daredevil in Hell's Kitchen, New York City.
tvShows.creator: Drew Goddard
tvShows.quote: I'm not seeking penance for what I've done, Father. I'm asking forgiveness...for what I'm about to do.

tvShows.title: Dark (2017)
tvShows.plot: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.
tvShows.creator: Baran bo Odar, Jantje Friese
tvShows.awards: Golden Camera Germany, Grimme Preis, Bambi Awards, Deutscher Fernsehpreis
tvShows.quote: The end is the beginning and the beginning is the end.

tvShows.title: Doctor Who (2005)
tvShows.plot: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions.
tvShows.creator: Sydney Newman
tvShows.awards: BAFTA TV Award for Best Drama Series
tvShows.quote: All of time and space, everything that ever happened or ever will... where do you want to start?

tvShows.title: Friends
tvShows.plot: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.
tvShows.creator: David Crane, Marta Kauffman
tvShows.awards: Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy Series
tvShows.quote: Welcome to the real world. It sucks! You're gonna love it.

tvShows.title: Game of Thrones
tvShows.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
tvShows.creator: David Benioff, D.B. Weiss
tvShows.awards: Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Drama Series

tvShows.title: Gravity Falls (2012)
tvShows.plot: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.
tvShows.creator: Alex Hirsch
tvShows.awards: Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Animated Program (2014)

tvShows.title: Rick and Morty
tvShows.plot: An eccentric and alcoholic scientist and his grandson go on adventures across the multiverse.
tvShows.creator: Dan Harmon, Justin Roiland
tvShows.awards: Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Animated Program (2018)

tvShows.title: Sherlock (2010)
tvShows.plot: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.
tvShows.creator: Mark Gatiss, Steven Moffat
tvShows.awards: Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Limited Series or Movie (2014)
tvShows.quote: I'm not a psychopath, Anderson. I'm a high-functioning sociopath. Do your research.

tvShows.title: The Bugs Bunny Show (1960)
tvShows.plot: A collection of classic Warner Bros. cartoons featuring Bugs Bunny and other Looney Tunes characters.
tvShows.creator: Chuck Jones, Friz Freleng
tvShows.awards: Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Achievement in Film Sound Mixing (1976)

tvShows.title: Tom & Jerry
tvShows.plot: A series of cartoon shorts featuring the rivalry between Tom, a house cat, and Jerry, a mouse.
tvShows.creator: William Hanna, Joseph Barbera
tvShows.awards: 7 Academy Awards for Best Animated Short Film (1943–1957)

tvShows.title: Top Gear (2002)
tvShows.plot: A motoring show featuring car reviews, celebrity interviews and stunts.
tvShows.writer: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond, James May
tvShows.creator: Derek Smith (1993–1998)
tvShows.awards: International Emmy Award for Non-Scripted Entertainment (2005)
